org.springframework.boot.task.ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder

Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.task
Utilities and classes related to task execution and scheduling.

    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder.awaitTermination(boolean awaitTermination)
    Set whether the executor should wait for scheduled tasks to complete on shutdown, not interrupting running tasks and executing all tasks in the queue.
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder.awaitTerminationPeriod(@Nullable Duration awaitTerminationPeriod)
    Set the maximum time the executor is supposed to block on shutdown.

    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder.poolSize(int poolSize)
    Set the maximum allowed number of threads.
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder.taskDecorator(@Nullable TaskDecorator taskDecorator)
    Set the TaskDecorator to be applied to the ThreadPoolTaskScheduler.
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder.threadNamePrefix(@Nullable String threadNamePrefix)
    Set the prefix to use for the names of newly created threads.
